website_summaries.verdict: Stomping its way from The Mandalorian is the intimidating, and challenging-to-assemble AT-ST raider, and its high articulation and battle features make this an extra-fun toy.
pros: Includes Mandalorian, Cara Dune, and 2 Klatoonian Raiders
cons: A moderately challenging set for younger builders

customer_reviews.title: 🔥🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: Great set with some nice minis. Definitely get it for $40 while you can. Shipping was also much faster than expected(arrived within two days if ordering)
customer_reviews.author: I heckle hessians

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Set and Minifigs, get two!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t be happier, I believe they come best in pairs! I got two and I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Nash Morrow

customer_reviews.title: Toss it and keep the figures.
customer_reviews.text: Worst LEGO ever. I wouldn’t say I’m a LEGO master but I have done some pretty considerably large sized builds. Cinderella’s castle, Stranger Things Upside Down, Millennium Falcon Kessel Run to name a few. I thought this would be an easy fairly quick easy to do build I could do with my 5 year old. WRONG. The pieces and the instructions were hard to connect and hard to understand. I don’t know if Bc of the success of the mandalorian they rushed to get a set out and this is what the put out - but it’s garbage. My 5 year old said it best - can we toss it and keep the figures.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa McConville King

customer_reviews.title: this is a cool set
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a cool set that can do a lot of different things.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Penn

customer_reviews.title: great Lego set!
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to assemble, but it was very fun. It is very fragile so i wouldn't use it for playing with, but it is good for display. very detailed, and it goes well with other star wars legos. Overall a great product, good value, and good for display. Pros: very fun (but challenging) build , good for display, very detailed, good price Cons: fragile, not for play, only for display.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Di Maio

customer_reviews.title: My 10  year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son saw this set available around the time the new “Mandalorian” show was released. It looked great & had several good mini-figures with it too. He opened it on Christmas Day & it was totally worth it! The colors & details on all the parts & figures are really vivid and slick. The instructions were some of the best I’ve seen Overall He has really enjoyed the build & the final result!
customer_reviews.author: Scott O.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding set
customer_reviews.text: Really love this set. Lots of stickers (I generally tend to prefer the printed pieces but this was fine). The color scheme is great and I love having the Mandalorian and Cara Dune figures and their huge guns. The fact that the turret swivels is extremely cool and I think it's a better build than most of the other walker sets. There's a bit of confusion on a few of the parts attaching the turret to the legs (had to rebuild a bunch of things) as it can be a little unclear from the instructions, but overall this is a great set if you take your time (which I didn't).
customer_reviews.author: P. S. Bose

customer_reviews.title: missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: great other then with all the extra little pieces they give you i was still missing a piece. i opened up the bags onto a tray and have looked everywhere and made sure it didnt stay stuck in the bag so only reason it isnt 5 stars is missing piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LEGO but..
customer_reviews.text: This is the most fragile LEGO I have ever built. While it looks great on the box, know that once fully assembled a child's sneeze will take this AT-ST to the ground. Don't fart, cough, or blow your nose near this LEGO because your hard work will be for nothing. Oh, and Carole Baskin did it.
customer_reviews.author: TH

customer_reviews.title: Neat piece but fragile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to build with my 5 year old (I would not recommend it for 5 year olds, he's particularly good at legos and following build schematics). We built it, probably took (mostly) him 10 hours, it's fun, was a good difficulty for him. The problem is, it breaks all the time if you're trying to play with it, which he wants to do. Would not recommend if you intend to play with it heavily.
customer_reviews.author: Erik R. Johnsen

customer_reviews.title: Two flaws in this kit were very frustrating
customer_reviews.text: There were a couple pieces that are wrong - very slight difference where a piece didn't fit into the wrong part or something was too short to hold firmly. My son was really upset, but eventually went to his collection of loose pieces and improvised a solution to the two problems he found. Actually turned out better than the original, but the differences were very minor.
customer_reviews.author: NewEnglander

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating build
customer_reviews.text: My son (15) is LEGO obsessed and he hated building this one. Quit on it 3 times and only finished it because I refused to buy him another LEGO until he finished it. He said the instructions “sucked” (his words) and it had way too many annoying stickers. He said it just wasn’t fun. It’s cute on display now that it’s finished. Definitely not an 8yr old build!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: It’s the Mandalorian!
customer_reviews.text: I knew my husband would love this because of the awesome Mando minifigure. The build itself is interesting— unlike the AT-ST from the Endor set, the top of this AT-ST swivels while the legs are immobile. It’s a cool looking set! Now we just need The Child in minifig form.
customer_reviews.author: Wraith347

customer_reviews.title: Big Hit with 6 Year Old Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves putting Legos together and really liked this one...it moves AND shoots! what could be better? He put this together over a three day period of time - totally without help. In his words "one the best birthdays ever"...he received another smaller Lego ship and a Star Wars t-shirt!
customer_reviews.author: Becky80558

customer_reviews.title: 10 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old son saw a picture of this after Christmas and just had to have it. Sadly, it wasn’t in stock anywhere! It was back ordered on amazon but it was worth the wait. He loves all things Star Wars. After watching the Mandalorian, he wanted it even more.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Kooi

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble very cool looking
customer_reviews.text: I own two previous versions of lego AT-ST, this is by far the most detailed and cool looking of them all. It's fun to build and overall a good addition to the collection. If this set had bring baby yoda it would be the MOST VALUE FOR MONEY lego set ever made, unfortunatelly they saved it for a higher priced set (Razor Crest set 75292 that will be over $130); Mando and Cara Dune are cool though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Many Stickers
customer_reviews.text: Great build - interesting cabling and design - but it loses a star for having too many stickers and not enough pre-printed pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Independent Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great gift, fun to build
customer_reviews.text: With any LEGO set this is a pricey item. With that being said my son loved this set. It was a little challenging to build, but a fun experience. Only reason I didn’t give 5 stars is because the box was severely damaged on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Akposey

customer_reviews.title: Excited to Have Product from the Mandalorian
customer_reviews.text: Love the Mandalorian and I'm so excited to have characters and items from the Mandalorian. Have not built the set, but I am pleased just having it hang around in the box for now until I get time to make it. I am hoping for more sets from the Mandalorian soon especially with The Child in them.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brzezinski

customer_reviews.title: Defective LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: Step 179 has two incompatible parts. Kids were so disappointed. Just google it and you will see so many complaints. LEGO is willing to replace it after emailing tho. They should have recall this set.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fu

customer_reviews.title: Mandalorian Season 1
customer_reviews.text: Our son (6) received this as a gift. He’s an “experienced” regular LEGO builder. Was a great multi-day build that required some adult help. Great LEGO set & one of the first to come out of the Mandalorian season 1
customer_reviews.author: RFM

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Set
customer_reviews.text: Worst lego set I've ever seen. Totally flimsy and the parts just fall off. My grandson was bored in 30 seconds. The walkers usually are sturdy. With this thing the top and bottom don't even attach. Save you money.
customer_reviews.author: george53b

customer_reviews.title: Keeping up with Star Wars.........
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for putting out this Mandalorian lego build. My 12 yr old built this before he saw the Disney Plus series. He was thrilled to realize that it was from Disney's newest Star Wars. He shared it with family and friends. He happily added this lego build to his Star War Collection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mando!
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome set. You get everything that you see and then you end up loving it. The AT ST isn't overly posable that's the only drawback. There is some great detail though.
customer_reviews.author: Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great set from a great series!
customer_reviews.text: i realize we had recently had the rogue one at-st but can we ever have too many walkers. the answer is no. love the subtle changes from the previous release.
customer_reviews.author: quirkymama

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Valentine gift for my 11yoa grandson and was drop shipped to him. It arrived during the predicted schedule. I didn't see the package, but grandson said everything was "great"!
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lego set for my grandson’s 10th birthday. He loved it and it gave him a good challenge putting it together. However, I think legos are overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Becky W

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF STICKERS
customer_reviews.text: The Lego at-st raider is an excellent $40 set. I would not pay a cent more. All functions of this product work well and effectively. The head portion of the vehicle rotates 180 degrees. The firing mechanisms are well integrated into the build as well. This set is detailed very well with around 20% greabling and 80% stickers. The latter is why I’ve given this product a 4/5 stars. Over all, a fun build.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bradley

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Great price considering the rise in pricing at stores for Mandelorian merchandise. My son loved it and it arrived in time for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: a rod

customer_reviews.title: Unique set and it has MANDO
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty decent Star Wars mini-fig collection, so my initial interest was just the Mandolorian mini-fig. The walker itself though was a pleasant bonus and is a unique addition to my collection. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome set but took a minute to build but pretty cool delicate,and doesn't move but it's fine the figures are cool so I do recommend
customer_reviews.author: merlin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome build. My first AT-ST. Raider accents really pop, and the detailing (like hoses on the leg) are very unique and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chung

customer_reviews.title: VERY AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I like the whole thing. I don't dislike it at all
customer_reviews.author: JPoulsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gift!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson got on this project and in a few hours had completely assembled it! He loved it. He is 9! 4 4th grade😊
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Drury

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed putting this together. It looks great and wasn’t too difficult. Only thing I’d say is if you plan on playing with it, be prepared to keep putting things back on. Lol Still, it’s a cool toy!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Santos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little set especially for the price. I love the “rebuilt” details like the wires, different paint. Plus, it’s the Mandalorian, but it, Duuhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Kaylan joubert

customer_reviews.title: Great detailed LEGO set!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really cool. Once all put together it’s really a great piece. Only loses 1 star because you have to apply stickers. Really wish the design was printed on the pieces the mini figures are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Grady

customer_reviews.title: Fun project
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to build! Love the Mandelorian having this fun to have ( wish there was a baby yoda) :)
customer_reviews.author: M. Montague

customer_reviews.title: Very cool set
customer_reviews.text: But it is one of the tougher builds for this age range. The legs had me backtracking a few times.
customer_reviews.author: arrggghhh

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift!
customer_reviews.text: My son received this as a gift and it was fun to assemble! Age appropriate and arrived on time!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mommy!

customer_reviews.title: Fun set
customer_reviews.text: My son got this set for Christmas and he loves it. He had it out together in a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Tamz

customer_reviews.title: Great set...horribly shipped
customer_reviews.text: Fun to build and remarkable how well the walker balances! Side note. Package arrived without a box! Shipping label was slapped on the Lego box. This was not purchased directly from Lego and it showed
customer_reviews.author: phillip p thornburgh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend for his birthday and he really enjoyed putting it together and they way it looks.

customer_reviews.title: Nice collection  piece
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it looked next the original at-st and the mandalorian figure is the best

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson, he and his father absolutely loved it! Lots of smiles :)

customer_reviews.title: Fun Activity
customer_reviews.text: My grandson enjoyed the challenges putting it together. He has enjoyed playing with it.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves this

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: -fast shipping -bright colors -great for gift giving -would buy again

customer_reviews.text: Same as the last AT-ST model but much more $. The cosmetic differences don't justify the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Set
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get here, but arrived in good shape and was fun to put together. We love Legos!

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't love Legos!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson. He absolutely loves Legos and this one was no exception!

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for 9-year-old. He loves LEGO and Star Wars. This was perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Challenging build. Designed different than previous AT-ST
customer_reviews.text: Little more challenging than the other AT-ST build. Great quality and design. Son prefers the design of the other AT-ST but really wanted this because of Mandalorian.

customer_reviews.title: Can't Complain!

customer_reviews.text: As expected. A little challenge but a whole lot of fun. It moves too!

customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four year old grandson who is a StarWarsophile. He was ecstatic when he opened the box. The box claims 8+ but I can't imagine an eight year old assembling this. Nevertheless, it is now on display with the rest of his impressive collection.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing AT-ST set

product_meta.title: LEGO Star Wars AT-ST Raider 75254 The Mandalorian Collectible All Terrain Scout Transport Walker Posable Building Model (540 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Style:StandardExcite any LEGO builder or fan with this 75254 Star Wars AT-ST Raider Walker collectible model. This brick-built Star Wars building toy features the same cannibalized look of the walker from the hit Star Wars TV series The Mandalorian, including jointed posable legs, a turning turret that opens up to reveal a detailed interior with space to sit a minifigure, plus 2 firing shooters. This advanced AT-ST transport construction toy also includes Star Wars characters The Mandalorian, Cara Dune and 2 Klatooinian Raider minifigures to really get the action going. This 540-piece Star Wars model kit is ideal for kids aged 8+ and fosters both creative and imaginative play as they act out their favorite Star Wars battle scenes.
feature_bullets: This collectible raider model includes 4 LEGO Star Wars minifigure characters: The Mandalorian, Cara Dune and 2 Klatooinian Raider, plus 3 blaster rifles and a blaster There's plenty to get the Star Wars action started straight away
This Star Wars collectible building AT-ST toy has lots of features to inspire young minds, including jointed posable legs, a turning turret that opens and 2 firing shooters

Inspire boys and girls aged 8+ with this LEGO brick version of the AT-ST Raider from the hit TV series, The Mandalorian This toy raider building model fosters both imaginative and creative play and sets the scene to play out LEGO action battles
This 540-piece LEGO Star Wars AT-ST Walker collectible model kit measures over 9-inch (25cm) high, 5-inch (15cm) long and 5-inch (13cm) wide

Immerse your LEGO Star Wars fan in galactic adventures with this unique AT-ST Raider model building kit with lots of play-starting features It makes a perfect holiday gift for all Star Wars collectors

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars1,879 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
